Reviews.Title: “From the nightmare of Ash Thursday, A descent into the hell of Hotel Jimmy”
Reviews.Author: BluePete
Reviews.Content: returning venice uk via schipol airport amsterdam 15 04 2010 nightmare ash thursday hit force flight cancelled european air space closed klm refusing provide support assistance spent night airport day amsterdam hotel luck vacancies except hotel jimmy league gentleman prison prisoners housed accommdation offered hotel jimmy resident trying escape amsterdam hotel jimmy pretty fed frustrated lying cell night listening drunken screams shouts fellow jimmy residents deserve bed isnt bed wooden box am kidding staircase seen designed punish residents crimes life shower toilet corridor cells postive note plenty hot water internet free advertised charged 80 euros stay hotel return uk via calais story shudder hotel jimmy probably worst stayed life
